about_the_game:
#What to do when the game cannot launch



Get your fist ready and defeat all the opponents in this VR rhythm action game!
Immerse yourself in the fantasy world while throwing your fist to the beat.
Release your stress and burn those calories through thrilling exercise!

New Feature [Update ver.1.1.0]

  • Added two new kinds of notes
    "Hard notes" are notes that are harder than usual and need to be destroyed with a lightning-fast punch!
    "Guard Notes" is a barrier that appears when you cross your arm in front of your chest.
  • Added option for the new game modes
    "Normal mode" will have all the notes, including the new Hard notes and Guard Notes
    "Exercise mode" will be the old game mode where there won't be any Hard and Guard Notes

Feature

  • 38 original songs in varying difficulties and music genres from Hard rock, Metal, Celtic to EDM. All designed and mapped for each stage setting.
  • Immerse yourself in 7, 6 live with 1 incoming, uniquely designed fantasy setting. Watch your environment gradually change in 3 stages as the songs go!
  • 7 Stage Boss to defeat, each with 2 color variations and unique attack styles.
  • 3 unique counter-attack styles to match your style: punch, squat, or spin your arm.
  • Calorie tracker, track your burned calories according to your height and weight.
  • 4 gauntlet variations.
  • Global Leaderboards, compete with others, and become the top 20 Blast Beater in the world!
  • Stream Blast Beat easily with in-game third-person perspective mode!

Function

  • Long-Range Attack
Smash standard notes with a punch.
Feel free to use straight, hook, uppercut, or any methods you like to smash the notes!
Knock down the arrow notes with a punch matching the direction indicated by the arrow.
Do your best to maintain your combos and keep those punches coming!

Remember to avoid getting hit by various obstacles as it will break off your combo and lower your scores.


  • Short-Range Attack
The enemy will get closer into a striking distance and deal direct attacks at you.
Getting hit will lower your score and break off your combo, so try your best to avoid it and wait for an opportunity to counter the attack!


  • Counter Attack
Now it's your chance to fight back! Punching? Squatting? Spinning your arm? Whatever you like to deal damage and knock the enemy back!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

reviews:
“If you are looking for a VR rhythm game but with a focus on fitness then I would certainly suggest Blast Beat as it checks basically all the boxes.”
4.4/5 – ImpulseGamer

“The awesome visual designs for levels and bosses, as well as the energetic and eclectic music selection had me playing this almost daily. It’s a great way to loosen up and get the blood flowing,”
Game Chronicles

“It feels so amazing and refreshing to exercise in a nostalgic fantasy setting like this. Can play it like you were battling, boxing, dancing, love how much freedom you can do when playing the game! My favorite is the sea stage!”
